speakerBioSummary.text:
• Agapi Stassinopoulos is a bestselling author and speaker who inspires audiences around the world
  • She is currently conducting workshops for Thrive Global, a company founded by her sister, Arianna Huffington, to help change the way we work and live
  • Agapi has spoken and conducted meditations at many organizations and companies including Accenture, SAP, LinkedIn, Pandora, Google, Nike, Weight Watchers, PepsiCo, and Starbucks among many others
  • She brings home the importance of self-care, practicing gratitude, generosity and self-love to enhance performance and productivity so we can experience happiness and fulfillment
  • In her book, Wake Up to the Joy of You: 52 Meditations and Practices for a Calmer, Happier Life, she takes readers on a journey and inspires them to let go of what doesn’t work and instead create the lives they really want

speakerBiography.text: Agapi Stassinopoulos is a bestselling author and speaker who inspires audiences around the world. In her previous book, Unbinding the Heart: A Dose of Greek Wisdom, Generosity, and Unconditional Love, she shares the wisdom from her life’s adventures and experiences. In her new book, Wake Up to the Joy of You: 52 Meditations and Practices for a Calmer, Happier Life, she takes readers on a journey and inspires them to let go of what doesn’t work and instead create the lives they really want. Agapi was trained in London at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art and then moved on to receive her master’s degree in psychology from the University of Santa Monica. Her previous books on the Greek archetypes, Gods and Goddesses in Love and Conversations with the Goddesses, were turned into PBS specials. She is currently conducting workshops for Thrive Global, a company founded by her sister, Arianna Huffington, to help change the way we work and live. Agapi has spoken and conducted meditations at many organizations and companies including Accenture, SAP, LinkedIn, Pandora, Google, Nike, Weight Watchers, PepsiCo, Starbucks, Global Citizen Company, Museum of Modern Art, ABC Carpet & Home, Women’s Health Magazine, Paul Mitchell, NYU and Hearst Communications amongst many others. She brings home the importance of self-care, practicing gratitude, generosity and self-love to enhance performance and productivity so we can experience happiness and fulfillment. She divides her time between New York and Los Angeles and was born and raised in Athens, Greece.

speakerReview.text: We were prepared for a high-quality lecture… but we didn’t expect a thousand people dancing in their seats, laughing non-stop, being deeply moved and talking for days about what a powerful effect her talk had on them.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: Never, in all of our years of hosting this event, have we seen such a quick and radical transformation among the attendees, in terms of pure love and joy.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: Agapi was such a delight and had the entire audience laughing and dancing throughout! I didn’t want it to end!
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: The audience loved her! The connection has been extraordinary ever since.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: Agapi has a delightful and humorous way of igniting you to listen and lead with your heart. When Agapi speaks, you think she’s reading your mind because she is connecting so deeply with your heart and all its pent up desires and truths.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW

speakerReview.text: Agapi Stassinopoulos is a gift to humankind. She truly is an inspirational speaker and writer who overflows with love, joy and wisdom.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW
